new_app_features: - Enhanced note organization using folders and hashtags. - Secure note-locking with Face ID or Touch ID. - Seamless syncing and sharing of notes across devices.

application_information.about_this_app: # Nottes Nottes is a note-taking app designed for organizing and managing notes across devices. It offers features like secure note-locking, seamless syncing, and enhanced organization using folders and hashtags. ## Key Features: - **Note Creation**: Create and manage notes with ease. - **Note Sharing**: Share notes with others. - **Note Editing**: Edit and update notes. - **Secure Note-Locking**: Lock notes with Face ID or Touch ID. - **Syncing and Sharing**: Sync and share notes across devices. For more information or support, visit the [Nottes Help Center](https://help.nottes.io/) or contact Nottes support at [support@nottes.io](mailto:support@nottes.io)
application_information.Required_Os: Android 6.0> or iOS 12.0> or Web Browser
